sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_cls_idea"> <x_snc_cls_idea action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>false</active> <description>Using split and join effectively</description> <episode display_value="NOWCommunity Live Stream - 2019-06-13">de61da01db86f3c0a8a2163705961930</episode> <name>Javascript array operations</name> <script><![CDATA[var list = ['Chuck', 'Kreg', 'Stacey', 'Dave', 'Andrew', 'Goran']; var answer1 = list.toString().split(','); gs.info(answer1 + ' -- ' + typeof answer1); var answer2 = 'ANSWER2=' + list.toString().split(','); gs.info(answer2 + ' -- ' + typeof answer2);]]></script> <sys_created_by>chuck.tomasi</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-05-31 14:03:20</sys_created_on> <sys_id>60f49730dbf57b80a8a21637059619db</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>chuck.tomasi</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-06-13 14:26:33</sys_updated_on> </x_snc_cls_idea> </record_update>
